patchinfo.name: glib2
patchinfo.description:
This update for glib2 provides the following fixes:
- Fix file descriptor leak when GSocketClient fails to connect asynchronously. (bsc#956599) - Add -lrt and PCRE libraries to link flags in glib-2.0.pc.in. (bsc#929542) - Add glibconfig.h to the -devel-32bit packages and ship them for x86_64 and s390x. (bsc#970694) - Relax g_thread_init() requirements so it can be called multiple times. (bsc#931445, bsc#846912)
